website_summaries.verdict: Fun way to keep wine cool and even turn it into a refreshing sangria.
pros: Removable stainless steel infuser sets this growler apart from its competitors
With a few slices of fruit, you can easily turn wine into delicious sangria
Dual-use lid has larger opening for filling the bottle and smaller rubber one for easy drinking
cons: Plastic handle attached to the lid not ideal for carrying the weight of a full bottle

customer_reviews.title: Bad design!
customer_reviews.text: Really good bottle for keeping water cold. Only complaint is that the button that holds the strap on the top is plastic. Terrible design flaw. When u have the bottle full this plastic button will break after a week. Mine is almost completely broken off. If they had a chance to redesign this I'd make that part metal or stainless steel. Very very bad design. I would not recommend to anyone just for that factor.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best bottle... period.
customer_reviews.text: So this is THE BEST water bottle I’ve ever owned! I have not stopped using it since I got it. I didn’t like the top that it comes with so I ordered another one here on Amazon for $20 I think?!? Either way, the bottle is worth every penny. It’s better looking than the Hydroflask, it’s triple insulated and keeps my water really cold for a hours. This is my honest review and I didn’t get paid for it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: _Mr_Garcia_

customer_reviews.title: Good size, stays cold, bad strap.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle does a great job at keeping things cold, haven't tested hot. Perfect size to keep all the water I need nice and cold for my workout session. I purchased a carrying case so I can lug this behemoth around easier when I walk and exercise. The case just came in, it is perfect for carrying the bottle around; however, before I even got to use the case, two days of using the bottle, the plastic strap just decided to break when I was unscrewing the top to refill it, I have never put any pressure on the strap either.
customer_reviews.author: Clesh

customer_reviews.title: Monster Size and Keeps It Cool
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a going away present for a young friend of ours. Even on a 90+ degree day, he said it kept his lemonade cold without ice for hours in the hot sun. I can’t speak as to durability, but if it lasts like the other echo vessels that we have gotten, it ought to be right up there. The only big surprise came with the size. It really is a huge container, seeing as it holds half of a gallon Even though the initial package got lost in transit, when the seller found out, he mailed another one right away as we were on a short timeline. It was much appreciated and arrived just fine..
customer_reviews.author: Heirloom Maters

customer_reviews.title: Don't. Spend. More.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these - they are just the best. Cold stays cold for DAYS. Same for hot. No off-flavor Quality materials Tea diffuser works Easy to clean Buyer Note: It should be obvious, but if you put room-temp water into it and ignore the fact that it's super-insulated, please don't put in the fridge and expect to have cold contents tomorrow... You need to either put already-cold liquids in or refrigerate (upright, silly) with the large cap open so that the contents can cool down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: I.B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Third time is NOT A CHARM
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the issue is. I bought my first "Boss" almost two years ago and it was amazing!!! The ice would last almost two days... Them the top strap broke. Ugh!!!....So I purchased a new one, the stainless one. The ice water didn't stay ice water very long. I figured maybe because it was stainless. So a couple of months ago I bought my third "Boss", another black one.... I don't know if they've made changes or what! I put ice and cold water in it not only was the ice melted in a couple of hours AND the top leaks!!!... WHAT THE HECK?!?!!! It's so irritating!
customer_reviews.author: Che' P.

customer_reviews.title: great product that comes from ecoVessel
customer_reviews.text: great product that comes from ecoVessel. holds large amounts of liquid and is easy to deal with. it comes with a large water infuser basket that sits below the cap, allowing you to infuse your water if you do wish to do so. IT has a very nice, sturdy build coupled with the fat that it will keep your drink cold for days with ice.. The only thing bad would be that if you filled the bottle all the way and hold it by the little strap it has, you risk breaking it. This is great since it is affordable and works well instead of spending more on something that does the same job
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Its definitely a boss!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend who is going through treatments for Chronic Lyme. She needs to drink a certain amount of water everyday and this helps her do that. She can add fruit, tea, or whatever to improve flavor if she wants. It is very well made and looks like it will last a long time. The only reason I gave it 4 starts is because it is hard to carry. The think is huge so it would be nice to have a handle on the side or a clip at the bottom so you could attach a lanyard and make a strap. Overall she is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: KBWICKHAM

customer_reviews.title: HOW  DOO  IT  KNOW ?
customer_reviews.text: I AM TRULY AND END-USER... I DON'T UNDERSTAND THERMODYNAMICS, BUT WHEN I PUT SOMETHING IN THIS THAT IT IS HOT, IT STAYS HOT... AND WHEN I PUT SOMETHING COLD IN IT, IT STAYS COLD. It is lightweight, durable, extra parts for things like the screw Top and lid are available online for PenNIES ADAM WAS UNDER $30... I'M GONNA BUY SOME OF THE MULTICOLORED ONES FOR SOME OF THE LADIES IN MY LIFE BUT THIS ONE SUITS ME JUST FINE. HIGH-QUALITY. BUY THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Tully

customer_reviews.title: I think I got a fake. I want a refund
customer_reviews.text: This did not keep my husbands coffee hot for even 3 hours. I have the smaller version and it keeps my coffee hot for 12 plus hours. Very upset at the amount of money I wasted. Amazon needs screen for fakes. Very close to losing this customer. I have gotten so many knock off and fakes in the last year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Trabucco

customer_reviews.title: I use this bottle constantly. I use the infuser ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this bottle constantly. I use the infuser to make green tea, which will stay hot for about 24 hours. I've also left it in the car during 115+ summer days, and come out 8 hours later to find it still full of ice cubes. The cap strap did break shortly after I bought it, but I contacted EcoVessel directly, and they sent me a replacement at no charge. I've had no problems with it since. Of the three big stainless water bottles I have, this is really the only one that gets used. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: monkeywrench133

customer_reviews.title: It is very durable, as well as stylish (for ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very durable, as well as stylish (for my tastes) and the temperature inside the bottle is preserved throughout the day. I put cold water and several ice cubes inside, and the next day there was still ice! WOW! I haven't tried putting in hot liquids yet, but I look forward to doing so. I have bought 7 of these things already, with different sizes for different needs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Charney

customer_reviews.title: The strap broke shortly after I got it. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke shortly after I got it. The handle cannot support the weight of the bottle. This should be made in cloth material to withstand the weight, not plastic
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jug
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best, I love this product. There is no taste or issues cleaning it. Super durable but I would advise getting a sleeve for it so it's easier to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.text: this is not worth the money. The plastic cap broke within months. Did not hold up at all. It is very heavy and cumbersome to use. The price is not worth the purchase. There are much better out there. I might be able to use at as scrap or a door stop. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this and it holds enough water for the daily recommended intake (64oz). I really liked that I could put my tea and fruit in it, which gave me natural flavored water. I lost it only 3 days after having it and it was such a disappointment, considering how much I paid for it. I left it at work and someone took it! Yeah it's that nice that someone will consider taking it! The second day I had it, I dropped it right on the top, just a small dent but this thing is solid. I will be getting another and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Daniel Preciado

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!! Great bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This growler is awesome!! I live in FL and work outside every morning I make some ice water and it stays cold well after I am done with working 10hr +. The infuser that comes with this mega bottle is deep and really helps deliver flavor when making infused watter. I recommend getting a sleeve with a side handle, as I have largd hands and it can be a bit cumbersome to hold on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Eric762

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This thing is freaking awesome. I bought it for work as I sit at a desk all day and wanted something that would keep 8 glasses of water and keep it cold. After going through like 3 of the other water bottles that had the cold pack in the middle but only kept the water cold for like an hour decided to try this. I leave my house at 6:30am and get home at 6:00pm and if there is water left it is still cold(even with no ice cubes). The only drawback is it can get heavy and cumbersome to pick up and down since there is no handle. But so far best water bottle I have had!
customer_reviews.author: Khalid Brown

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase this keeps me on track with drinking my daily intake with water. It keeps it so cold for days only con is that it’s heavy but that doesn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: yammyb

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this bottle for him
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for his birthday...he loves it!! He is a postal worker and a big issue he has is his water getting incredibly warm in the summer..this bottle has solved that problem. His water has been staying ice cold. So happy I found this bottle for him!
customer_reviews.author: Pasqualino Ricco

customer_reviews.title: This is not only great for on the go it also makes the best ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not only great for on the go it also makes the best tea and infused water. I put tea in the infuser fill it to the top and put it in the refrigerator over night or so and the tea is smooth never bitter. I will be buying another one so I can have a tasty beverage all the time and stay hydrated better not that summer is coming.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I received the older model.
customer_reviews.text: The model I received was NOT the model advertised here on amazon. I received the older model that says 36 hours cold not 72 hours cold as per the advertisement. Pretty disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Jess fletcher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS INSULATED INFUSER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is BY FAR THE BEST liquid container I've owned!! With an insulated liner to keep liquids cool during the blazing heat of summer I have enjoyed my infused tea all day long and it stays perfectly cold.(I anticipate it will keep my tea hot during the winter as well.) Other plastic containers that hold 64 oz. of liquid have dropped and busted open, while this one survives the hardest knocks.
customer_reviews.author: H G.

customer_reviews.title: Performs as promised!
customer_reviews.text: This actually performs really well. I have only used it for cold so far and have had water stay cold for over 24 hours. It probably would have stayed longer, but, I drank it all at that point LOL. Seriously I am really happy with this bottle.l
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very Good quality for storage of dried foods stuff !
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The "Boss" is right (^_^)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Nothing amazes me more than getting brain freeze from water from the previous night. Love it. I have a smaller one for quick trips and keep this one for work on long days. Never been so hydrated:D
customer_reviews.author: RobinLee

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great insulated bottle. Filled it with ice and water, left in truck in El dorado Nat forest(80-85 at day, 55at night). Three days later returned to truck and bottle still had ice. The only drawback is the lid does not seem to be insulated, and will sweat if you leave it on its side rather than upright.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Wife LOVES It!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my wife who is an athlete and has a really tough time making sure to drink enough water and we have gone through NUMEROUS water jugs and bottles and Eco Vessel is her favorite. We got this big one and she REALLY loves it. She's had it now for a couple weeks and raves about it!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and features
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. Great value for product. I am deployed to Afghanistan and maintaining hydration level is a priority. This does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Shay H.

customer_reviews.title: Best canister ever
customer_reviews.text: Best canister ever. Each family member has one. We drink water like a camel. My husband uses this large on we like the next size down as this a heavy well constructed canister. I must for people on the go who like to have cold water all day. It really does keep your hot / or cold for more than 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The bottle itself is awesome. The spout and drinking openings are the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle itself is awesome. The spout and drinking openings are the perfect size. The strainer works well for fruit or tea leaves. However, the plastic that holds the lid broke after 1 day of use. Very inconvenient. Otherwise it would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the plastc sport jug
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the plastic jug. I like the handle for ease of transportation and the strainer for putting lemmon slices. It holds a good amount of water and it looks nice. I am also a fan of he spout to drink from the top. I would recommend this to people looking to get away from bpa plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: jmot

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle great price
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle for the price I use it all the tine for work and sometimes the ice in the bottle will last well into the the second day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Boss Growler is fantastic, i used it so far to carry hot ...
customer_reviews.text: This Boss Growler is fantastic, i used it so far to carry hot fruit tea with me to work, and it stay's hot for more then 36 hours, outside is cool to the touch, i will soon use it for cold drinks once the weather get's hot, but its so easy to clean, fill or rinse, the infuser works great, a solid product that leave's very little to be improved on. I can strongly recommend it for all activities where you need to stay hydrated all day !
customer_reviews.author: Michael Falkenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Really like the bottle with the wide mouth and the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the bottle with the wide mouth and the small so you can drink your water not wear it the plastic piece that holds the small lid broke that needs to be redesigned I'm just gonna do some sort of paracord weave to reattach it/ hint hint
customer_reviews.author: Robert brown

customer_reviews.title: Decided to get this product after I was so happy with the 24oz container
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get this product after I was so happy with the 24oz container. This is great when traveling on trips and it really keeps everything very cold. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Huey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottle
customer_reviews.text: After receiving a faulty growler from the seller I got this from Amazon, I contacted Eco vessel themselves and they sent me a replacement. (I would recommend calling if you have problems to make things go faster) the new bottle works great and I've used it to carry homemade beer for New Years. The temperature and carbonation held surprisingly well even after a couple of days. I now use it as a water bottle for the gym because I drink like a camel when I workout. Perfect size for me and I love how the infuser can be doubled as an ice strainer.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Wong

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall
customer_reviews.text: Really great. Keeps items cold for a long time. Infuser is nice, but would be nicer if a little larger. Only negative is it is a really large container, so a lot to carry around
customer_reviews.author: engineer

customer_reviews.title: The bottle is fantastic it keeps the water cold for days and well ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is fantastic it keeps the water cold for days and well made and easy to carry around. What was annoying is it leaked, and took about two months of shipping things from Eco Vessel to finally get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Netcam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing works great, and keeps cold for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stone

customer_reviews.title: downward quality
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged one that dripped bought in 2015 to one in 5/2017 that does not keep things cool at all please exchange.
customer_reviews.author: enkilm

customer_reviews.title: i use this every day to carry ice water. ...
customer_reviews.text: i use this every day to carry ice water. i live in mississippi and the summer temps are close to 100. this vessel keeps water ice cold for two days in a pick up truck with direct sun and no tint on windows and windows closed. it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we use for water and re fill smaller bottles from ...
customer_reviews.text: we use for water and re fill smaller bottles from it. keeps ice for several days even when re filling several times
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: This is the best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of the best....keeps it cold and/or warm....I would buy it again....but I have not had any problems with it
customer_reviews.author: boris

customer_reviews.title: ... was bigger than I thought but I do seriously love this bottle
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I thought but I do seriously love this bottle. Only problem with it though is that it leaks whenever it is on its side or it tips over, even with both caps tightly sealed. It is pretty annoying, but love how it carries so much as I can drink it a couple times a day, and use it as light weights while walking around
customer_reviews.author: Julia Liu

customer_reviews.title: The infuser is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.text: A less expensive alternative to the hydroflask, and the hydroflask straw top fits without leaking. The infuser is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: John Zarr

customer_reviews.title: Great Jugs...
customer_reviews.text: Really Good 1/2 gallon thermos. This has lots of insulation and will keep stuff hot/cold for quite a while. Love Eco Vessel stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Best insulation out there
customer_reviews.text: Well made and performs as advertised. Best insulation out there, even better than Yeti. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good to make a large jar of tea for one day supply of two persons.
customer_reviews.author: Dequan Chen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't broken after pretty much daily use. Really keeps things cold.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Armenta

customer_reviews.title: Ice melts in 8 hours
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, well-made, however we used it twice on a camping trip and ice water got warm after eight hours
customer_reviews.author: kadeer M Halimi

customer_reviews.title: I fill it with 18 ice cubes and cold tap ...
customer_reviews.text: I fill it with 18 ice cubes and cold tap water, ice melts within 3 hrs but water stays cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: We have used this as a growler for beer, for gin and tonics, and for ice water. It has been excellent for keeping everything cold and maintaining a clean taste for all beverages!
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Eco Vellel Is The Best
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my Eco Vessel Boss Stainless Steel flask....the container stays cool all the time I can just fill it up with cold water in the morning and it will still be cold the next day without putting it into the fridge excellent value I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Goldie

customer_reviews.title: They weren't kidding about the water temperature! It keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: They weren't kidding about the water temperature! It keeps water ice cold for almost 2 days and hot for a long time. But the silver one I ordered leaked through the big opening, so you can't use the smaller opening for drinking. I haven't used the black one but hoping that this one is not defective.
customer_reviews.author: celina

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy Father!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Father's day gift and I absolutely love it! The lid is very clever. You can unscrew the lower lid for a wide mouth opening that makes it easy to put in ice and liquids. When you want to drink, however, you can just unscrew the small upper lid and it's easy to drink without spilling, even if you're in a moving vehicle. I love the size of this container as well. It holds enough water for a full round of golf in the summer heat. The vacuum insulation keeps things icy cold for as much as two days if it was heavily loaded with ice. I'm so happy with my new water jug!
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described and works great! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding seller. Product is as described and works great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tazchatt

customer_reviews.title: This would have 5 stars if the plastic holding the ...
customer_reviews.text: This would have 5 stars if the plastic holding the cap together hadn't broken after only one day of use. Makes it awkward to carry around now...I've seen that this has been an issue for other reviewers too, so if anyone has a solution to this please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for size not so great for keeping cold beverages
customer_reviews.text: Love the large size but it doesn't keep things cold very long. I get maybe 5 hours of cold out of it even when I put a lot of ice in it. I have other Eco Vessel bottles and they keep colder way longer than this one. I love the size because I can fill it once for the day but wish it would stay colder longer. I bought this to replace one of my other great Eco Vessels that had broken because it had been dropped a few too many times and the top where the lid screwed in cracked and was leaking if it got knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and they absolutely loved it. Water stays cool forever!
customer_reviews.author: lylah

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy ice cold water for +24 hours!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bottle! When I first got this bottle, I filled it with a tray of ice cubes and water and left it on the kitchen table. 24 hours later, the water was ice cold and still had a few small pieces of ice floating around in it. The water was so cold I could barely drink it, lol! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Poole

customer_reviews.title: This Insulated bottle is awesome! I am really enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: This Insulated bottle is awesome! I am really enjoying it. It retains cold water very well. I haven't tried hot yet.
customer_reviews.author: HEROSHE

customer_reviews.title: Big lid is tough to screw down flat to eliminate ...
customer_reviews.text: Big lid is tough to screw down flat to eliminate drips. Watching the plastic strap connecting the two lids. Does not appear bulletproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: I liked this product an ot was great but the plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product an ot was great but the plastic strip broke on me an after that it makes the entire container not worth having at that point
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately bought this as a gift and was told it ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately bought this as a gift and was told it leaks today . If I knew I would have returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great!!!...keeps my stuff cold with ice 2 3 days...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Barker

customer_reviews.title: Nice insulated bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Has held up well so far. We like the infuser and the two caps
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and he loves it. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lamarche

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This bottle leaks EVERYWHERE. I am going to promptly return it for a full refund and continue my search for a proper insulated growler.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: EcoVessel 64 oz
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I thought it would be and more,i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. Very portable and keep ice water cold for 48 hours - depending on the ice!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome..
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome... I have had ice stay in it for 3 days. It's well made and fits the bill for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cap BROKEN within 1 day of use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for about 1 day... 2nd day the plastic that holds the cap to the body broke off on BOTH ends. Cheap plastic possibly? Now it's super awkward to carry around, especially when it's filled. Very disappointed that it broke in 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: YETI aint got nothing on the ECCO!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for both water and I have used it as a growler for a micro brewery. It is fantastic for keeping things ice cold and it holds pressurization well enough to keep the beer carbonated. I will buy more of these in the future. It is a fantastic buy
customer_reviews.author: GLENN DONAGHY

product_meta.title: Vacuum Insulated Large Travel Growler Bottle for Water, Beer, and Tea - Stainless Steel 64 oz Thermos Water Bottle with Infuser Filter and Wide Mouth Dual Opening Cap - EcoVessel BOSS
product_meta.description: EcoVessel BOSS 64oz TriMax Triple Insulated Bottle with Infuser Show everyone who’s Boss. Whether you need to crush a difficult workout of the day or huge presentation at work, the 64oz EcoVessel BOSS TriMax Triple Insulated Growler will help you do it all. As a jack of all trades, the Boss comes with a tea and fruit infuser to create several of your favorite beverages including tea for when you curl up with a book, fruit-infused water or to-go sangria for a day at the beach. This versatile growler will keep beverages cold for 36 hours, and hot beverages hot for up to 8 hours. Features a wide opening for easy filling and a small opening for easy drinking. Features: TriMax Triple Insulation Technology Keeps cold 36 hours, hot up to 8 No BPA, phthalates or liners Premium 18/8 stainless steel Dual use leak proof top - wide opening for easy filling, smaller opening for easy drinking Interchangeable with flip spout lid Removable infuser for fruit, tea, herbs Sturdy carrying strap Hand wash Recyclable 64 fl. oz./1.9 L Dimensions: 5 x 5 x 11.5
feature_bullets: BRING THE BOSS - Bring EcoVessel BOSS Insulated Stainless Steel Beer Growler Bottle With Tea And Fruit Infuser on your day off or to your next adventure!
WITH REMOVABLE STAINLESS STEEL INFUSER - We’ve included a removable stainless steel infuser, so you have the option of adding the flavors of fresh fruit to your drinks.
TRIPLE INSULATION FOR SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE - This growler features our vacuum TriMax triple insulation technology and has been tested to keep liquids cold for 36 hours and hot up to 8 hours
INTERCHANGEABLE TOP TO SUIT YOUR NEED - A versatile vessel for anything, anytime, anyplace and now available with interchangeable tops!

A BIG COLORFUL ADDITION TO YOUR DRINKING LIFESTYLE- On a summer day or warm evening, pour some wine in the growler, add sliced citrus fruits and enjoy refreshingly chilled sangria that will stay cold all day .
Fill this reusable stainless steel growler with icy cold craft beer at the brewery or fresh hot coffee from home or your local coffee house
perfect to take on a picnic or day at the beach! You can pick a color in a variety of choices
If you’re a tea enthusiast, fill the infuser with leaves and the Boss will be your favorite tea maker
Its dual use leak proof top has a wide opening for easy filling and a small opening for easy drinking OR use the Flip Spout Lid if you want to drink from the straw

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
